companyInfo.name: Brand AI Positioning Platform
companyInfo.focus: Brand Positioning · Brand Identity · Product Value · Brand Narrative
companyInfo.subtitle: AI-driven brand positioning system based on multi-Agent workflow, providing end-to-end AI solutions for wine brands from positioning to narrative.

intro: Brand AI Positioning Platform is an AI-driven brand strategy system tailored for wine brands. Through 5 intelligent Agent workflows, we systematize and intelligently transform core aspects such as brand positioning, brand identity, product value, and brand narrative, moving brand strategy from experience-driven to data-driven.

The platform adopts a multi-Agent collaboration architecture, with each Agent focusing on specific aspects of brand strategy. Through structured dialogue and intelligent analysis, it provides brands with precise positioning recommendations, complete brand identity systems, clear product value propositions, and multimodal brand narrative solutions.

Our system integrates brand positioning theory, visual identity design, content marketing strategies, and AI generation technology to provide wine brands with one-stop solutions from strategy to execution.
aboutUs.mission: Empower brand strategy through AI technology, providing professional, efficient, and actionable brand positioning and identity services for wine brands, enabling every brand to find its unique value positioning.
aboutUs.vision: To become the most professional AI intelligent platform in the field of brand strategy, driving brand decisions with data and empowering brand innovation with AI.
values: Equal emphasis on professionalism and innovation
Equal emphasis on strategic depth and execution efficiency
Equal emphasis on theoretical methods and industry insights
Equal emphasis on continuous learning and effect guarantee

coreAdvantages.title: Multi-Agent Workflow
coreAdvantages.description: 5 professional Agents work collaboratively to cover the entire brand positioning process. Each Agent focuses on specific aspects, ensuring professional, complete, and actionable output through structured dialogue guidance.

coreAdvantages.title: Brand Positioning Agent
coreAdvantages.description: Based on classic methodologies such as STP theory and positioning theory, analyze market, competitors, and users through multi-round dialogue to output precise brand positioning strategies.

coreAdvantages.title: Brand Identity Agent
coreAdvantages.description: Output complete brand identity manual at once, including Logo design guidance, color system, typography standards, visual elements, etc., ensuring brand visual consistency.

coreAdvantages.title: Brand Narrative Agent
coreAdvantages.description: Two-step approach: first form a narrative plan, then generate multimodal scripts (text, images, videos) based on the plan, connecting to professional tools for final output.

brandPositioning.title: Brand Positioning Workflow
brandPositioning.subtitle: 5 intelligent Agents work collaboratively to systematically complete brand positioning

agents.name: Market Analysis Agent
agents.description: Analyze target market, industry trends, user personas to provide data foundation for brand positioning

agents.name: Competitor Analysis Agent
agents.description: Deeply analyze competitor positioning, strengths and weaknesses, market performance to find differentiation opportunities

agents.name: Positioning Strategy Agent
agents.description: Based on STP theory and positioning theory, output precise brand positioning strategies

agents.name: Positioning Validation Agent
agents.description: Validate the feasibility and market acceptance of positioning strategies, provide optimization recommendations

agents.name: Positioning Output Agent
agents.description: Integrate all analysis results to output complete brand positioning plan and execution recommendations

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity System
brandIdentity.subtitle: Output complete AI manual at once to guide brand visual system construction

features.name: Logo Design Guidance
features.description: Provide Logo design direction, style recommendations, application standards

features.name: Color System
features.description: Define primary, secondary, and functional colors to establish complete color system

features.name: Typography Standards
features.description: Specify brand fonts, font size hierarchy, typography rules

features.name: Visual Elements
features.description: Icon system, graphic elements, photography style and other visual assets

features.name: Application Standards
features.description: Brand application guidelines and taboos in different scenarios

productValue.title: Product Value Positioning
productValue.subtitle: Clear value proposition and differentiation positioning

dimensions.name: Functional Value
dimensions.description: Core problems solved and functional advantages of the product

dimensions.name: Emotional Value
dimensions.description: Emotional experiences and brand associations brought by the product

dimensions.name: Social Value
dimensions.description: Social significance and cultural value reflected by the product

dimensions.name: Differentiation Value
dimensions.description: Unique advantages and irreplaceability compared to competitors

brandNarrative.title: Brand Narrative System
brandNarrative.subtitle: Two-step approach: narrative plan + multimodal script generation

workflow.name: Narrative Plan Generation
workflow.description: Based on brand positioning and product value, generate complete brand narrative plan

workflow.name: Multimodal Script Generation
workflow.description: Based on narrative plan, call excellent advertising templates and social media influencer content templates to generate multimodal scripts

workflow.name: Professional Tool Integration
workflow.description: Connect generated scripts to professional design and video tools to output final products

team.intro: The platform consists of senior brand strategy experts, AI algorithm engineers, and visual design consultants. Team members have rich brand positioning practical experience and deep theoretical foundation, committed to providing professional and efficient intelligent brand services for wine brands.

caseStudies.title: Premium Baijiu Brand Positioning Rebranding
caseStudies.subtitle: Brand transformation from traditional to modern
caseStudies.painPoint: Traditional baijiu brands face youth-oriented challenges and need to reposition to attract new generation consumers.

features.name: Market Analysis
features.description: Deeply analyze target market, user personas, consumption trends to discover youth-oriented opportunities

features.name: Positioning Strategy
features.description: Based on STP theory, output "New Chinese Light Luxury" brand positioning, balancing tradition and modernity

features.name: Brand Identity
features.description: Design new brand visual system, maintaining traditional elements while incorporating modern design

caseStudies.outcome: Brand awareness increased by 60%, young user proportion increased from 15% to 45%, brand value increased by 200%.

caseStudies.title: Craft Beer Brand Identity System
caseStudies.subtitle: Build complete brand visual from scratch
caseStudies.painPoint: New brand lacks unified visual identity system, brand image is chaotic.

features.name: Brand Identity Agent
features.description: Output complete brand identity manual at once, including Logo, colors, fonts, visual elements

features.name: Visual System
features.description: Establish "Craft Culture + Modern Design" visual system to reflect brand personality

features.name: Application Standards
features.description: Develop detailed application guidelines to ensure brand visual consistency

caseStudies.outcome: Brand visual consistency improved by 80%, brand recognition increased by 70%, user brand memory increased by 50%.

caseStudies.title: Wine Brand Narrative Plan
caseStudies.subtitle: Create warm brand stories

features.name: Narrative Plan
features.description: Based on brand positioning, generate "Heritage and Innovation" narrative theme and content framework

features.name: Multimodal Scripts
features.description: Generate text, image, video scripts, connect to professional tools for final output

features.name: Social Media Content
features.description: Based on influencer content templates, generate social media content suitable for various platforms

caseStudies.outcome: Brand story reach increased by 300%, user emotional connection increased by 80%, brand loyalty increased by 40%.
